Movie_Cast: Taraji P. Henson, Octavia Spencer, Janelle Monáe, Kevin Costner
Movie_Des: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

Movie_Cast: Sam Neill, Julian Dennison, Rima Te Wiata, Rachel House

Movie_Cast: Ben Whishaw, Hugh Grant, Hugh Bonneville, Sally Hawkins

Movie_Cast: Shahid Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, Kareena Kapoor, Diljit Dosanjh

Movie_Cast: Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson, Matthew McConaughey, Ralph Fiennes
Movie_Des: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.

Movie_Cast: Casey Affleck, Michelle Williams, Kyle Chandler, Lucas Hedges
Movie_Des: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

Movie_Cast: Roland Møller, Louis Hofmann, Joel Basman, Mikkel Boe Følsgaard

Movie_Cast: Felicity Jones, Diego Luna, Alan Tudyk, Donnie Yen
Movie_Des: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.

Movie_Cast: Viggo Mortensen, George MacKay, Samantha Isler, Annalise Basso
Movie_Des: In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

Movie_Cast: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Walton Goggins

Movie_Cast: Saoirse Ronan, Emma Watson, Florence Pugh, Eliza Scanlen

Movie_Cast: Douglas Booth, Jerome Flynn, Robert Gulaczyk, Helen McCrory

Movie_Cast: Bill Nighy, Imelda Staunton, Dominic West, Paddy Considine

Movie_Des: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

Movie_Cast: Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit, Jamie Chung, T.J. Miller

Movie_Des: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

Movie_Cast: Hideaki Anno, Hidetoshi Nishijima, Miori Takimoto, Masahiko Nishimura
Movie_Des: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

Movie_Cast: Geoffrey Rush, Jim Sturgess, Sylvia Hoeks, Donald Sutherland
Movie_Des: A lonely art expert working for a mysterious and reclusive heiress finds not only her art worth examining.

Movie_Cast: Chris Evans, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson, Robert Redford

Movie_Cast: Jared Gilman, Kara Hayward, Bruce Willis, Bill Murray
Movie_Des: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.

Movie_Cast: Lee Byung-hun, Choi Min-sik, Jeon Gook-hwan, Ho-jin Chun
Movie_Des: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

Movie_Cast: Hye-ja Kim, Won Bin, Jin Goo, Je-mun Yun
Movie_Des: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

Movie_Cast: Kim Yoon-seok, Ha Jung-woo, Yeong-hie Seo, Kim Yoo-jeong
Movie_Des: A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.

Movie_Des: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

Movie_Des: James Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

Movie_Des: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

Movie_Cast: Keira Knightley, James McAvoy, Brenda Blethyn, Saoirse Ronan

Movie_Des: An action drama about a mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic who moonlights as a getaway driver, and finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.

Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.

Movie_Cast: Steve Carell, Toni Collette, Greg Kinnear, Abigail Breslin
Movie_Des: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

Movie_Name: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button

Movie_Des: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

Movie_Cast: Nathan Fillion, Gina Torres, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Alan Tudyk
Movie_Des: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

Movie_Cast: Miyoko Shôji, Shôzô Îzuka, Mami Koyama, Fumiko Orikasa
Movie_Des: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

Movie_Cast: Denzel Washington, Will Patton, Wood Harris, Ryan Hurst
Movie_Des: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

Movie_Cast: Cecilia Roth, Marisa Paredes, Candela Peña, Antonia San Juan
Movie_Des: Young Esteban wants to become a writer and also to discover the identity of his second mother, a trans woman, carefully concealed by his mother Manuela.

Movie_Cast: Tom Hanks, Helen Hunt, Paul Sanchez, Lari White
Movie_Des: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

Movie_Cast: Russell Crowe, Al Pacino, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora

Movie_Cast: Jake Gyllenhaal, Chris Cooper, Laura Dern, Chris Owen

Movie_Cast: John Cusack, Cameron Diaz, Catherine Keener, John Malkovich
Movie_Des: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

Movie_Cast: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Jude Law, Gore Vidal
Movie_Des: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

Movie_Cast: Michael Douglas, Deborah Kara Unger, Sean Penn, James Rebhorn
Movie_Des: After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.

Movie_Des: Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

Movie_Cast: Massimo Troisi, Philippe Noiret, Maria Grazia Cucinotta, Renato Scarpa
Movie_Des: A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

Movie_Cast: Tom Guiry, Mike Vitar, Art LaFleur, Patrick Renna

Movie_Cast: Anthony Hopkins, Emma Thompson, John Haycraft, Christopher Reeve

Movie_Cast: Robert De Niro, Chazz Palminteri, Lillo Brancato, Francis Capra
Movie_Des: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

Movie_Des: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

Movie_Cast: Chow Yun-Fat, Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Teresa Mo, Philip Chan

Movie_Des: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.
